title: FT_Profile Function Block
description:
SCALE_B scales an input value BYTE and calculates an output value in
REAL. The input value X is limited here to I_LO and I_HI. SCALE_D (IN, 0,
255, 0, 100) scales an input with 8-bit resolution on the output 0..100.
name: FT_Profile

input.name: K
input.description: The gain factor applied to the output value, with a default value of 1.0.

input.name: O
input.description: The offset added to the output value.

input.name: M
input.description: A multiplier applied to the time intervals, with a default value of 1.0.

input.name: E
input.description: A boolean signal to start the profile generation.

input.name: time_1
input.description: The time at which value_1 is reached.

input.name: time_2
input.description: The time at which value_2 is reached.

input.name: time_3
input.description: The time at which value_3 is reached.

input.name: time_10
input.description: The time at which value_10 is reached.

input.name: time_11
input.description: The time at which value_11 is reached.

input.name: time_12
input.description: The time at which value_12 is reached.

input.name: time_13
input.description: The time at which value_13 is reached.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output value calculated from the interpolation and adjusted by K and O.

output.name: RUN
output.description: A boolean indicating whether the function block is currently running or not.

output.name: ET
output.description: Elapsed time since the start of the profile generation.
